file_content.text: I've never seen anything like it.
Commander... where are we?
Omnicannon to bridge. Come in.
Hello again.
I like your friends. They'll look lovely in my trophy case.
Don't do this, Vaylin. You're not your father. You can be better than him.
Please listen to reason.
Finally, something we can agree on.
It's me you want, not them. Let my people go, and I'll give up.
[Lie] I surrender.
We both know Father won't let that happen.
Threatening my people won't save your pathetic life.
You won't live to enjoy it.
I never threaten, Outlander.
I need a new corpse to hang on my wall. If I can't have you...
Tsk, the Twi'lek's no good. Her shade of blue clashes with my decor.
Vaylin adapts quickly. She cannot strike you down, but she will find other ways to hurt you.
You stopped her from killing me. You can save my crew.
Stop her before it's too late.
That will not be necessary.
The phrase you recited... "Kneel before the dragon of Zakuul." Can I control her with that?
Explain your power over her.
Not like this. You must be closer.
She can have her fun--and then I'll have mine.
Killing them won't hurt me.
You will, but not here or now.
Something is coming...
Theron? Lana? Does anyone read?
Don't touch them, Vaylin. "Kneel before the dragon of Zakuul."
I know about your conditioning.
Ha! Nice try, Outlander.
You must be closer if you hope to activate her conditioning.
Tsk, the Twi'lek's no good. Her coloring clashes with my decor.
